content.description: The following question refers to the topic of progress and modernity in the late nineteenth century.
content.question: Historians have connected the growing lack of confidence in an objective view of nature seen among many late-nineteenth and early-twentieth-century intellectuals most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: Advances in theoretical physics such as relativity theory and quantum physics
The growing popularity of Marxist socialism
Increasing influence of non-European cultures on European art
The expansion of government support for scientific and technical research

content.answer: Advances in theoretical physics such as relativity theory and quantum physics

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
